abstract: State Dept human rights report on several countries assails Iran's record, saying it has stifled dissent and engaged in unlawful killings; assessment comes ahead of Sec of State John Kerry's departure for Vienna to attempt to reach nuclear accord with Iran.
lead_paragraph: A report on several nations’ records may draw special attention to Iranian practices as the United States looks to wrap up complex negotiations.

headline.main: Iran Again Chided on Human Rights Amid Efforts to Reach Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: State Dept. Human Rights Report Assails Iran

snippet: A report on several nations’ records may draw special attention to Iranian practices as the United States looks to wrap up complex negotiations.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
